projects.title: kaizen
projects.description:
Rebranded the company from iamadinkra which was a personal brand to kaizen av project, worked on designing the logo, and other brand assets including the brand manual, t-shirts, documents, and business cards, with extensive research aligning to the brand's vision and appearance. 

 Worked on Redesigning and developing the new look for kaizen av projects, I created user flows to help visualize how users will interact with the website, designed all the pages on Figma with interesting UI and interactive prototyping, After approvalal from the client, I began the development for the website using the latest technologies and added features that will make kaizen av projects stand out from it competitors.

projects.title: Desoc Website
projects.description: A landing page for the Department of Graphic Design at the University of Education, Winneba
